text: As for the disbelievers who deny Our signs those shall be the inhabit- ants of the fire abiding therein.� Those who receive favors without gratitude and pay no heed to affirming taṣdīq and recognizing taḥqīq [the truth] will have a painful punish- ment in the end muÌajjal and a separation in the here and now muʿajjal.
